body.bibl: Petorella, Fabrizio. “Power and Prophecy in Late Antique Hagiography: The Life of Saint Daniel the Stylite.” In Narrating Power and Authority in Late Antique and Medieval Hagiography from East to West, edited by Ghazzal Dabiri, 183–96.
